title: Permanently Banned for 1 game, 0 previous punishments, light flame.
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
KOREAPROUD: broken
KOREAPROUD: It's counterplayable
KOREAPROUD: range
KOREAPROUD: range
KOREAPROUD: you have to disengage on her ult
In-Game
KOREAPROUD: I'm likely underage
KOREAPROUD: touch me daddy
KOREAPROUD: uwu
KOREAPROUD: touch me first daaddy
KOREAPROUD: nice
KOREAPROUD: thresh runs away from me when he has flash and I don't
KOREAPROUD: sick call
KOREAPROUD: but hey
KOREAPROUD: we won lane
KOREAPROUD: cause the supports alive
KOREAPROUD: gg
KOREAPROUD: thank god the thresh hits his q's too
KOREAPROUD: stop
KOREAPROUD: aa
KOREAPROUD: minions
KOREAPROUD: stop
KOREAPROUD: stop
KOREAPROUD: tell thresh if he autos minions anymore im afk
KOREAPROUD: nice q!
KOREAPROUD: ff 1
KOREAPROUD: 15
KOREAPROUD: open bot
KOREAPROUD: not laning with this first time threhs
KOREAPROUD: yep
KOREAPROUD: going bot again
KOREAPROUD: ziggs your up
KOREAPROUD: mid
KOREAPROUD: ziggs and thresh i solo lane
KOREAPROUD: sylas face me
KOREAPROUD: uesless sup
KOREAPROUD: like normal
KOREAPROUD: imagine being m7 on a champ and still being dog with them
KOREAPROUD: xD
KOREAPROUD: yikes
KOREAPROUD: 6 deaths
KOREAPROUD: xd
KOREAPROUD: xd
KOREAPROUD: xd
KOREAPROUD: afk
KOREAPROUD: enjoy the game
KOREAPROUD: later
KOREAPROUD: you stole my gromop
KOREAPROUD: your the worst support ever
KOREAPROUD: xD
KOREAPROUD: too bad
KOREAPROUD: thresh is a %%%%
KOREAPROUD: 6 deaths
KOREAPROUD: 67 cs?
KOREAPROUD: no shit
KOREAPROUD: you just took shit
KOREAPROUD: from me
KOREAPROUD: 24/7
KOREAPROUD: I tried to play
KOREAPROUD: but you trolled bot
KOREAPROUD: you didn't do shit to save me
KOREAPROUD: you stole cs
KOREAPROUD: you wouldn't stop autoing the wave
KOREAPROUD: you stole gromp
KOREAPROUD: you were useless
KOREAPROUD: all lane
KOREAPROUD: and you expect me not to be toxic?
KOREAPROUD: what a fucking joke dude
KOREAPROUD: let's see about that thresh
KOREAPROUD: nah
KOREAPROUD: idk about that
KOREAPROUD: ill just soft
KOREAPROUD: afk farm and never fight with you
KOREAPROUD: not until you stfu
KOREAPROUD: 2 bot
KOREAPROUD: 7 deaths
KOREAPROUD: xD
KOREAPROUD: mayb if you didnt troll bot
KOREAPROUD: we woulda had a chance
KOREAPROUD: ?
KOREAPROUD: you auto;d the wave when i aksed you to stop
KOREAPROUD: you watched me die
KOREAPROUD: xD
KOREAPROUD: dude idc
KOREAPROUD: yes
KOREAPROUD: 100%
KOREAPROUD: ?
KOREAPROUD: b
KOREAPROUD: 8 deaths
KOREAPROUD: said he's not trolling
KOREAPROUD: atleast im not hardstuck
KOREAPROUD: xd
KOREAPROUD: gold 3
KOREAPROUD: with 320 games
KOREAPROUD: xD
KOREAPROUD: 320 games
KOREAPROUD: 50% winrate
KOREAPROUD: hardstuck
KOREAPROUD: afk threhs?
KOREAPROUD: 9 deaths
KOREAPROUD: ]yikes
KOREAPROUD: get me out
KOREAPROUD: troll sup
Post-Game
KOREAPROUD: This thresh talking shit
KOREAPROUD: just checked his match history
KOREAPROUD: xD
KOREAPROUD: 1-10
KOREAPROUD: 2-9
KOREAPROUD: 1-8
KOREAPROUD: 1-7
KOREAPROUD: sick match history thresh

That's it folks. 0 punishments before hand. GG? Other than a force name change about 6 months ago < XD

replies.body:
you were not banned for one game

you were **PUNISHED** for that game

due to that, your placement on the punishment "ladder" escalated to a perma ban (just like the 14-day suspension punishment card said it would)

you were perma'd for showing a **consistent pattern** of rule breaking and an inability/refusal to reform
That was the only punishment I've ever recieved tho?

dont take this personally, we get a LOT of false claims around here so in my personal opinion you are either 

A) lying

or

B) you have a history of banned accounts which is rumored to lead to harsher punishments for new accounts by the same people

now I could be wrong but nothing else really makes sense, i suppose there is a miniscule chance it was placed in error but i wouldnt hold my breathe on that one

you can submit a support ticket and ask them
not lying atleast so. I don't know kinda sucks

idk man given the tone of the chat log you seem SUPER comfortable flaming people and being toxic so I'm having a VERY hard time believing this was your first offense

i mean look how casually you dropped this line 

KOREAPROUD: too bad
KOREAPROUD: thresh is a %%%%

just a small example of your almost completely toxic log...
I love how this game wants to be a sport but wants zero banter.  Just a bunch of snowflakes on this game.
there's a line between banter and flame which the OP clearly crossed. Maybe the "snowflakes" are the one who complain when they get punished for not following simple rules meant for children?

Yeah thats the thing, there are probably more adults on this game than kids.  However, they arent offended by the punishments, we are actually in a state of awe at how offended people get for literally nothing.  Muting people has become the norm on this game not just to avoid getting tilted but to avoid being reported.  Ive been in various amounts of games where people at the end of the game are falsely stating constantly the amount of toxicity that players bring and are trying to get people mass reported.  In fact, I think every single game int the past year or longer of league someone in the end game lobby is asking everyone to report someone on both teams even.  

The amount of reporting is ridiculous.  They are indeed snowflakes.

> [{quoted}](name=aosomer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mZvxnWEg,comment-id=00000000000000000000000200000000,timestamp=2019-09-11T23:34:17.764+0000)
>
> Yeah thats the thing, there are probably more adults on this game than kids.  However, they arent offended by the punishments

complete conjecture and pure opinion

>we are actually in a state of awe at how offended people get for literally nothing.  

Dont use "we", you speak for no one

>Muting people has become the norm on this game not just to avoid getting tilted but to avoid being reported.  Ive been in various amounts of games where people at the end of the game are falsely stating constantly the amount of toxicity that players bring and are trying to get people mass reported.  In fact, I think every single game int the past year or longer of league someone in the end game lobby is asking everyone to report someone on both teams even.  
> 
> The amount of reporting is ridiculous.  They are indeed snowflakes.

you can get reported in every single game you play. If you do no break the rules then nothing will happen
was reduced to a 2 week
seems appropriate

It was definently toxic, but it's not like I was flaming him for being bad, dude trolled my game and he knew he was doing it. I'd feel bad if they didn't deserve it, I was really frustrated. but it really was my first offense, what do I get out of lying to you guys? I already made the ticket I just want riot to see it
Also Ill have to check what that censored word was, but im certain it wasn't like hatespeech. Ill let you know tho, Definently a chat restriction or a two week game but idk bout straight to a perma
usually that 4 letters word and in the context of that sentence, I would say it is a "C_woman_body_part" word and it is a zero tolerance word.
that's  a zero tol word really? jesus

> [{quoted}](name=KOREAPROUD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mZvxnWEg,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-06T10:53:00.528+0000)
>
> that's  a zero tol word really? jesus

Nah it isn't that guy just assumed it because it's censored on the boards.
Highly unlikely, but if that is true, feel free to send riot a ticket. Of course, they have records..
Idk i think ped0philic shit might get you a permaban. I suggest dropping that weaboo perverted bullshit. Its just cringey.

If you truly had no prior punishments then hopefully Riot Support can get that straightened out and assign a proper punishment here, as make no mistake the behavior shown in these logs absolutely deserves a punishment.

Actually, I think it is plausible this was considered a proper punishment for the level of the account. We do occasionally get lower level smurf accounts here posting about escalated punishments. CR worthy giving 14 day first instead, and ZT skipping to perm instead.
It was reduced to a 2 week
Definently worthy of a punishment, but not a perma from 0 other punishments IMO.

>KOREAPROUD: I'm likely underage
KOREAPROUD: touch me daddy
KOREAPROUD: uwu
KOREAPROUD: touch me first daaddy

This sexually suggestive content might be a problem too aside from all the harrassment and score and rank shaming
i was memeing with the team lol. Not like i was serious they knew that, they memed with me.
Press x to doubt
What do i get for lying to you? sorry you feel that way but I'm not.
sympathy cards. it happens more often than you'd think
dont need or want sympathy, I want real answers lol. I'm not saying I don't deserve a punishment or that I'm not toxic lmfao.

You read your chat log and think to yourself "If this was someone else, I'd want to play with them"? seriously OP?

Takes like 10 lines of text before i"m already exhausted by you. 

Every single one of these chat restriction threads is the exact same. 



"Blah blah blah

--My chat log where I spoke like 100+ times

Followed by replies from OP defending everything said in said chat log, when it's pointed out. "They started it" "I did X because Z". Always the same responses. "



I have still yet to EVER meet someone who spoke that much in game that was ever someone I wanted on my team. 

If the ban was given to you in error I sincerely hope it's lifted, but I'd bet money that even if it was in error, you are headed towards a chat ban in your future regardless. 

Unless you are queued up with 4 friends, there is really just never a good reason to talk that much in game.
Wow, you spammed a lot in a 24 minute game. If you talked less, you probably wouldn't have had half the cs as the enemy adc.
or if my support didn't auto everything even after i asked him to stop, or didnt steal jungle camps i was taking

> [{quoted}](name=KOREAPROUD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mZvxnWEg,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-09-06T06:37:55.225+0000)
>
> or if my support didn't auto everything even after i asked him to stop, or didnt steal jungle camps i was taking

Your support built no damage , would not be able to even do camps, and his cs wasn't anything special that would've suggested he was stealing your farm. You're full of shit and are fooling no one on this forum.
aren't you in effect "stealing" said jungle camps yourself?

It was after laning phase and we rotated through top for a pick, I started gromp cause top took the wave and jungler died, support waited to last hit it, but I was fine to take the gromp at that time.
If you're 100% positive that you've NEVER had a 14 day ban, contact riot support and ask them about it
i did, waiting for a response. I doubt they'll do anything but hopefully they can give me a damn good reason.

> [{quoted}](name=KOREAPROUD,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mZvxnWEg,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-09-06T06:39:18.163+0000)
>
> i did, waiting for a response. I doubt they'll do anything but hopefully they can give me a damn good reason.

Then you just have to wait for their response
If you've NEVER had a 14 day ban, they will most likely change your punishment to a 14 day ban
Or then you've had a 14 day ban but you've just forgotten and they'll tell you that
they did

no, that is not how that works

trust me, i have ***excessive*** first hand experience with the ban system

it is _always_ 10 game chat restrict > 25 games > 14day > permaban

14day is never skipped unless you're scripting, boosting, account sharing, or otherwise cheating
chat restrictions are never skipped unless you use a "zero tolerance" word, e.g. "kys" or any racial slur

we know you are lying, and you  cannot convince anyone otherwise. give up.
it got reverted so, thanks for you showing how honorable you are, and how not toxic you are! :D Have a good day!
Riot doesnt care about you or your gaming experience.  They just want to sell you skins.
youre funny

> KOREAPROUD: ff 1
KOREAPROUD: 15
KOREAPROUD: open bot

Deserved

I was tower dived the second i got into lane repetitively, i had 2 options, a. go 1-20 2b. swap with mid and actually have a chance at staying in the game. If thats worth a perma than I guess ill see a perma every other day in my ranked games
If getting towerdived is enough for you to decide to open whatever lane, you don't deserve playing ranked

mid went bot and got a double, and I farmed and harrased their mid. The mid laner didn't get hurt by this and if anything it slowed enemy momentum. If you'd prefer an inting adc cause they cant safely farm under tower than idk dude. it was a 1v2 bot since thresh would dance and watch me die without doing anything or trying to force a 2v2 and die instantly
